main event: Two civilian guards observed a stationary red light in the sky that changed colors and moved in fast circles at the Anniston Ordnance Depot in January 1959.
interesting points: The object was visible for about 9 minutes,It changed from red to lighter and dull-red,The sighting occurred at the Anniston Ordnance Depot,This was the second UFO report in the area within a month,The object was described as grapefruit-sized and displayed unusual circular movements.
sighted object: stationary red ball or light in the sky
witness description: civilian guards at Anniston Ordnance Depot
